distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for dpdk fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-2132: Fixed DoS when a vhost header crosses more than two descriptors and exhausts all mbufs (bsc#1202903).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A permissive list of allowed inputs flaw was found in DPDK. This issue allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service triggered by sending a crafted Vhost header to DPDK.
notes.title: CVE description
